short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to track packages, show exchange rate and download images from banggood.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thanks to this extension you can easily download or link product images found on http://www.banggood.com (normally banggood doesn't allow this).

It also shows currency rate used by shop, so you always know which currency is best for you.

You will also see initial tracking information for your packages (including "untracked" packages!) when viewing order list.

Additionally it allows to see stock information for some products (not all unfortunately - banggood blocked this information).

See screenshots for details.

Note: BG very often changes it's page, so please report if something stops working. Thanks!
